overview: Pt. 1  This concert premieres on PBS January 18, 2007  Peter Frampton was one of the most successful arena rock stars of the '70s. Frampton still remains one of the most thrilling live performers around, and his two-hour Soundstage performance is no exception. In the first hour Frampton performs the songs: Off the hook, Lying, Lines on my face, Show me the way, Black hole sun,  Nasssau/Baby I love your way,  Do you feel like we do?  Pt. 2  This concert premieres on PBS January 25, 2007  In Peter Frampton’s second hour on Soundstage, Frampton performs: All I want to be (is by your side), Wind of change, I need ground, Money (I’ll give you that), Can’t take that away, I don’t need no doctor, While my guitar gently weeps
title: Peter Frampton: Live at Soundstage
